name: Cup of a Cup and Saucer (Trembleuse)
description: Cup of a Cup and Saucer (Trembleuse); Du Paquier Porcelain Manufactory (Austrian, active 1719 - 1744); Vienna, Austria; about 1740; Hard-paste porcelain, enamelled and gilded; 7 x 9.2 x 6.2 cm (2 3/4 x 3 5/8 x 2 7/16 in.); 85.DE.375.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Cup of a Cup and Saucer (Trembleuse)
